message: Hello, you said you will pay for dinner?
Hello. How are you doing today?
Hello, Do you want to join my event?
Hey I'm planning to go Alaska soon, can I join you on your trip?
I love Alaska, but I'm going to NYC. Do you want to join?
Yes, NYC sounds good. I have been there before and I love it.
Hello, I'll be in your town soon, do you want to eat vegan food?
